evidence.claim: DOULAS by the BAY emphasizes HIPAA compliance in their operations.
The company utilizes X12 EDI standards for health-related transactions.
They reference FHIR principles for health information exchange.
They have a focus on integrating care management solutions that may imply the use of standardized health tech protocols.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of engaging in X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
